Verses: 1 yoodhaa dhEsaththu raajaakkaLaagiya usiyaa, yOdhaam, aagaaS, esEkkiyaa enbavargaLin naatkaLilum, yOvaasin kumaaranaagiya yeSrayElin raajaavaagiya yerobeyaam enbavanin naatkaLilum, peyEriyin kumaaranaagiya Osiyaavukku uNdaana karththarudaiya vasanam.

2 karththar OsiyaavaikkoNdu uraikkaththodanginapOdhu, karththar Osiyaavai nOkki: nee pOi, oru sOra Sthreeyaiyum sOrappiLLaigaLaiyum unnidamaaga sErththukkoL; dhEsam karththarai vittu vilagi sOrampOyitru endraar.
3 avan pOi, thiplaayimin kumaaraththiyaagiya kOmErai sErththukkoNdaan; avaL garppandhariththu, avanukku oru kumaaranaip petraaL.

4 appozhudhu karththar avanai nOkki: ivanukku yeSrayEl ennum pEridu; Enenil innum konjakaalaththilE naan Ekoovin vamsaththaaridaththilE yeSrayElin raththappazhiyai visaariththu, iSravEl vamsaththaarin raajyabaaraththai ozhiyappaNNuvEn.
5 annaaLil yeSrayElin paLLaththaakkilE iSravElin villai muRippEn endraar.

6 avaL thirumba garppandhariththu, oru kumaaraththiyaip petraaL; appozhudhu avar avanai nOkki: ivaLukku lOrugaamaa ennum pEridu; Enenil naan ini iSravEl vamsaththaarukku irakkancheyvadhillai, naan avargaLai muzhuvadhum agatrividuvEn.

7 yoodhaavin vamsaththaarukkO naan irakkancheyvEn; villinaalum, pattayaththinaalum, yuththaththinaalum, kudhiraigaLinaalum, kudhiraiveerarinaalum naan avargaLai ratchiyaamal, avargaLudaiya dhEvanaagiya karththaraalE avargaLai ratchippEn endraar.
8 avaL lOrugaamaavai mulaimaRakkapaNNinapiRpaadu, garppandhariththu oru kumaaranaip petraaL.
9 appozhudhu avar: ivanukku lOgammee ennum pEridu; Enenil neengaL en janamalla, naan ungaL dhEvanaayiruppadhillai.

10 endraalum, iSravEl puththirarin thogai aLakkavum eNNavun koodaadha kadaRkarai maNalaippOlirukkum; neengaL en janamalla endru avargaLukku solvadhaRkup padhilaaga neengaL jeevanuLLa dhEvanudaiya piLLaigaL endru avargaLukku sollappadum.
11 appozhudhu yoodhaa puththirarum iSravEl puththirarum Egamaaik koottappattu, thangaLukku orE adhipadhiyai ERpaduththi, dhEsaththilirundhu puRappattu varuvaargaL; yeSrayElin naaL peridhaayirukkum.
